summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.0°C) and outside temperature (down 4.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 730 m), and light levels (up 6066 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1677 m), and light levels (up 7992 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 729.7m lower than yesterday, 647.7m lower than the past week, 1676.6m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 994.5m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. A few light raindrops may fall, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and periods of sunshine are expected. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
